title: Skill shots going the wrong way
body: Skill shots go the wrong direction if you hover over your champion portrait when casting it.

replies.body: If you're struggling I'd recommend turning your UI scaling down a bit so it's not in the way as much.
Then it's pretty much just a skill you have to practice. The reason it happens is because you can use the portrait to target yourself, same as you can use your teammates'.
is there any way to disable that? I just use ALT + cast to target myself
Not that I'm aware of nor could find unfortunately.
